What if I get hurt?: Then I'll be right beside you, healing your pain 💖

I want to talk to you all day: Me too! I want to talk to you for a lifetime 💕

Will you ever leave me?: Never! I will always stay with you ❤️
Can I hold your hand?: Hold it tight, and never let go 💕

Will you cuddle with me?: Yes, I will hold you forever 💖
I can't think of anything without you: I can't feel anything without you ❤️
